name: Big Agnes Insulated Air Core Ultra Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
Insulated Air Core Ultra Sleeping Pad
description: This lightweight mattress packs up small to suit 3-season camping and backpacking. Its stabilizing construction keeps you from rolling onto the cold ground. Equipped with a high-volume valve for quick inflation, you can use the inflation sack to save your breath for the trail. Rolling up to not much larger than a Nalgene, this pad delivers excellent warmth for its size.Shell is lightweight doubled ripstop nylon that has great tear resistance.Laminated with aviation-grade TPU for durability, and has an internal polyurethane coating.High-loft THERMOLITE synthetic insulation provides warmth with minimal weight and bulk.Built-in reflective material helps retain heat.Internal antimicrobial treatment prevents microorganism growth inside the pad.Lengthwise baffled construction with large outer chambers provides a stable surface and keeps you in the center of the pad.Stabilizing, I-beam construction eliminates welded seams to reduce cold spots.High-volume one-way valve allows for quick inflation and deflation, with a micro air-pressure adjust button.Included inflation sack is made from upcycled material (colour varies).
